cnd22:4.5: Amalo buddho → tasmā buddho acalo (bj); tasmā buddho amalo (sya-all) | malavimutto → malavippamutto (bj, sya-all)
cnd22:18.2: andhakaraṇaṁ aññāṇakaraṇaṁ → acakkhukaraṇaṁ aññāṇakaraṇaṁ (bj); acakkhukaraṇaṁ añāṇakaraṇaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | byantīakāsi → byantīmakāsi (sya-all)
cnd22:19.4: Dve lokā … sambhavaloko ca → dve lokā sampatti ca bhavaloko vipatti ca bhavaloko (sya-all)
cnd22:25.3: Evamahaṁ → evampahaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed snp5.19:120 [Pārāyanānugītigāthā]); evamāhaṁ (sya-all)
cnd22:26.7: parittavanakaṁ → parittavanakaṁ parittakaṁ vanaṁ (bj); rittavanakaṁ (sya-all) | bahūdakaṁ → bahurukkhaṁ (bj, sya-all)
cnd22:27.5: mānasakaṁ → mānusakataṁ (sya-all) | pavadataṁ maggavādinaṁ → pavadatamaggavādinaṁ (sya-all); pavaramaggavādinaṁ (mr)
cnd22:31.1: tathāgatasāsanā → tathāgatasāsanā devātidevasāsanā (bj); tathāgatasāsanā devasāsanā (sya-all, mr)
cnd22:39.2: manussarāhasseyyakāni → manussarāhaseyyakāni (bj, sya-all, mr) | paṭisallānasāruppāni → paṭisallāṇasāruppāni (mr)
cnd22:62.3: na atthi → na santi (bj); na sati (csp1ed)
cnd22:88.3: Namassamāno vivasemi → namassamānova vasemi (si); namassamāno vivasāmi (sya-all)
cnd22:95.3: pāmojjaṁ → pāmujjaṁ (sya-all) | modanā → idaṁ padaṁ bj potthake
cnd22:107.2: kāmabaḷise → kāmapalipe (bj); kāmabalise (sya-all) | vasamāno āvasamāno parivasamāno → avasemāno parisemāno (sya-all)
cnd22:113.1: vakkalitthero → vakkalithero (bj); vakkali (sya-all) | saddho → muttasaddho (bj, sya-all)
cnd22:122.4: buddhavacanaṁ → pakatiyā (bj, mr) | pariyāputaṁ → pariyāpuṭaṁ (sya-all, mr)
cnd22:127.5: Sammutidevā vuccanti rājāno → katame sammatidevā rājāno (sya-all)
cnd22:136.3: Nibbānassa → yassa (bj, sya-all) | tassa aññathattaṁ → tassa aññadatthu (sya-all)
